name: The Wall
description: Combining dynamic maps and progression with slick combat, The Wall offers an infinite number of ways for you to construct your own battles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5-3770 / AMD FX-9590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 670 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i7-4690K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
